title: Love Bomb
lyrics:
‘Love Bomb’ is one of Doja Cat’s many unreleased songs.
[Chorus]
Woah, falling in love
Cats got my tongue
Talk to me, baby, please
Is that what you want?
'Cause I could just go all on my own
Don’t waste my time now 'cause my love is bomb
[Verse]
My love’s the bomb
My hugs are strong, you know it
My junk is showin'
I cut the lawn
, get wit' it
I fuck til’ dawn
My bucks are long, I pay up
I got this one
Yeah, that’s on me for dinner
These losers sore, he’s got to cuff the winner
Dress on tight, gots to cut with scissors
Up first thing in the morning, I make us breakfast
Give some neck in the mornin', that’s a necklace
Paint you the picture like I’m van Gogh
Power couple, we run it, our love don’t blow
If you needed some company, hun, come through
We could kick it and chop it like I’m Kung Fu

[Bridge]
Love's hard, true, but love come' through
And when love come true, then love's done you
Can't love just one if ya' gon' love two
Love me, now I un-love you
[Chorus]
Woah, falling in love
Cats got my tongue
Talk to me, baby, please
Is that what you want?
'Cause I could just go all on my own
Don’t waste my time now 'cause my love is bomb
[Outro]
My love
My love is
My love
My love is
My love
My love is
My love is
My love is bomb
My love
My love is
My love
My love is
My love
My love is
My love is
My love is bomb
